437:1: atha khalu śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya divyaiścandanacūrṇavarṣairabhyavakīrya ābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhituṣṭuvuḥ—
437:17: na te kalpasahasrāṇi jātu yāsyanti durgatim||8||
437:20: mokṣyante ca laghuṃ sarve chittvā vai kleśabandhanam|
437:24: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte prāñjalayastasthuḥ,
437:26: atha khalu cābhāsvarā devaputrāstathāgataṃ bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ divyairnānāprakāraiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanachatradhvajapatākābhiḥ saṃpūjya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya cābhirgāthābhirabhyastāviṣuḥ—
437:43: evaṃ khalu bhikṣava ābhāsvarā devāstathāgatamabhisaṃstutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ||
437:44: atha khalu subrahmadevaputrapramukhā brahmakāyikā devāstathāgataṃ bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇamanekamaṇiratnakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrapratyuptena ratnajālenābhichādya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya cābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhyastāviṣuḥ—
437:65: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ subrahmadevaputrapramukhā brahmakāyikā devāstathāgatamābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya ekānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ||
437:66: atha khalu te śuklapākṣikā māraputrā yena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāman|
437:68: pratyakṣe'smi bale tavātivipule mārasya ghorā camū
437:69: yatsā māracamū mahāpratibhayā ekakṣaṇe te jitā|
437:70: na ca te utthitu naiva kāyu trasito no vā girā vyāhṛtā
437:73: te tubhyaṃ na samartha bodhisuvaṭā saṃcālituṃ kampitum|
437:76: bhāryā ceṣṭatamā sutāśca dayitā dāsyaśca dāsāstathā
437:78: hastā pādaśirottamāṅgamapi vā cakṣūṃṣi jihvā tathā
437:79: tyaktā te varabodhicarya caratā tenādya vibhrājase||23||
437:80: uktaṃ yadvacanaṃ tvayā subahuśo buddho bhaviṣyāmyahaṃ
437:83: sā caiṣā pratipūrṇa tubhya praṇidhistāriṣyase prāṇinaḥ||24||
437:84: yatpuṇyaṃ ca stavitva vādivṛṣabhaṃ lokasya cakṣurdadaṃ
437:88: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavo māraputrāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ||
437:89: atha khalu paranirmitavaśavartī devaputro'nekairdevaputraśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto jāmbūnadasuvarṇavarṇaiḥ padmaistathāgatamabhyavakīrya saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhyastāvīt—
437:105: cakṣu bhava parāyaṇa iha bhuvi tribhave||29||
437:106: priyu bhava naramaru na ca khali viṣaye
437:108: dinadarśi pariṣadi na ti samu tribhave
437:109: nāthu gati parāyaṇu tvamiha hi jagataḥ||30||
437:110: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavo vaśavartidevapramukhāḥ parinirmitavaśavartino devaputrāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ||
437:111: atha khalu sunirmito devaputro devasaṃghaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛto nānāratnapaṭṭadāmaistathāgatamabhichādya saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhyastāvīt—
437:115: utpanno iha loki cetiyo divi bhuvi mahitaḥ||31||
437:131: vande tvāṃ trisahasri adbhutaṃ divi bhuvi mahitam||35||
437:132: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ sunirmito devaputraḥ saparivārastathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte'sthāt prāñjalīkṛtastathāgataṃ namaskurvan||
437:133: atha khalu saṃtuṣito devaputraḥ sārdhaṃ tuṣitakāyikairdevairyena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmat|
437:134: upasaṃkramya mahatā divyavastrajālena bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgatamabhisaṃchādya saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhyastauṣīt—
437:155: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ saṃtuṣito devaputraḥ saparivārastathāgatamabhiṣṭatyaikānte'sthāt prāñjalīkṛtastathāgataṃ namasyamānaḥ||
437:156: atha khalu suyāmadevaputrapramukhāḥ suyāmā devā yena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmat|
437:178: evaṃ khalu te suyāmadevaputrapramukhā devāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ||
437:179: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ trāyatriṃśakāyikairdevairnānāpuṣpadhūpadīpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachatradhvajapatākāvyūhaistathāgataṃ saṃpūjya ābhirgāthābhirabhyastāvīt—
437:180: askhalitā anavadyā sadā susthitā merukalpā mune
437:183: tasya viśeṣu yena bodhidrume mārasenā jitā||46||
437:193: mā khu śramaṇarāju bādhiṣyate bodhimaṇḍe sthitaḥ|
437:194: na ca bhavatu babhūva tebhyo bhayaṃ no ca kāyeñjanā
437:196: yatha ca purimakebhi siṃhāsane prāpta bodhi varā
437:197: tatha tvayā anubuddha tulyā samā anyathā tvaṃ na hi|
437:198: samamanasa samacitta sarvajñatā sthāma prāptaṃ tvayā
437:199: tena bhava svayaṃbhu lokottamo puṇyakṣetraṃ jage||50||
437:200: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ devaputraistrāyatriṃśaistathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte'sthāt prāñjalīkṛtastathāgataṃ namaskurvan||
437:201: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ sārdhaṃ caturmahārājakāyikairdevaputrairyena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmat|
437:202: upasaṃkramyābhimuktakacampakasumanāvārṣikadhānuskārimālyadāmaparigṛhītā apsaraḥśatasahasraparivṛtā divyasaṃgītisaṃpravāditena tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā ābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhistuṣṭuvuḥ—
437:214: ārya vimukti labhanti te hi sarve||53||
437:216: na ca puna vidvamadena jātu mattaḥ|
437:220: yatra hi tādṛśu jātu sattva loke|
437:223: evaṃ khalu caturmahārājapramukhā mahārājakāyikā devā bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ||
437:224: atha khalvantarikṣā devāstathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkramyābhisaṃbodheḥ pūjākarmaṇe sarvamantarīkṣaṃ ratnajālena kiṅkiṇījālena ratnachatrai ratnapatākābhī ratnapaṭṭadāmai ratnāvataṃsakairvividhamuktāhārapuṣpadāmārdhakāyikadevatāparigṛhītairardhacandrakaiśca samalaṃkṛtya tathāgatāya niryātayanti sma|
437:245: na ca te mado jāyati vismayo vā||60||
437:246: evaṃ khalvantarīkṣadevā bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte'vatasthivantaḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ||
437:247: atha khalu bhaumā devāstathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvāvantaṃ dharaṇītalaṃ suśodhitopaliptaṃ gandhodakapariṣiktaṃ puṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ca kṛtvā nānādūṣyavitānavitataṃ ca tathāgatāya niryātayanti sma|
437:252: na ca ahu aspṛśitvā bodhi uttheṣya asmāt||61||
437:259: yatra ku raju loke sarva obhāsitāste
437:264: sarva tava dadāmo bhuṅkṣvimāṃ tvaṃ yatheṣṭam||64||
437:267: dharmakatha kathentī ye'pi vā tāṃ śṛṇonti
437:269: evaṃ khalu bhaumā devā bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭatyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ||
